meanings.definition: A person or thing living or existing at the same time as another.
meanings.sent1: My contemporaries in school were my classmates.
meanings.sent2: She enjoyed discussing art with her contemporaries.
meanings.sent3: The dog's contemporaries at the park were all wagging their tails happily.
meanings.sent4: The tree's contemporaries stood tall and proud in the forest.
meanings.sent5: The author's contemporaries praised her latest book for its creativity.

meanings.definition: Of or belonging to the same time.
meanings.sent1: The painting showcased a contemporary style that appealed to many.
meanings.sent2: The architecture of the building was very contemporary.
meanings.sent3: The contemporary music festival drew a large crowd.
meanings.sent4: Her outfit was a perfect blend of modern and contemporary fashion.
meanings.sent5: The technology used in the project was truly contemporary.
